wikipedia_page.main: Anthony Michael Gordon (born 24 February 2001) is an English professional footballer who plays as an attacking midfielder for Premier League club Everton and the England national under-21 team.

response: *Anthony Gordon (police officer) (c. 1976–2005), Canadian policeman, victim in the Mayerthorpe tragedy
*Anthony Gordon (footballer) (born 2001), English footballer with Everton F.C.

**Under-23s: Victor Anichebe (2006), John Irving (2007), John Irving (2008), Kieran Agard (2009), Shane Duffy (2010), Jose Baxter (2011), Adam Forshaw (2012), N/A (2013), Tyias Browning (2014), Brendan Galloway (2015), Joe Williams (2016),  Jonjoe Kenny  (2017), Morgan Feeney (2018), Nathan Broadhead (2019), Anthony Gordon (2020), Ryan Astley (2021)
